items.sentence: I wish that I could speak French like a native speaker.
I want to know if you know who broke my kitchen window.
Tom hasn\'t sung professionally for almost three years.
We\'re looking for someone to teach French to our kids.
Tom has already been told several times not to do that.
Tom listened to the whole story without saying a thing.
I think it\'s really important for you to go to Boston.
I can\'t imagine living in a world without electricity.
I waited for Tom to tell me what to do, but he didn\'t.
Tom and Mary both know that that\'s unlikely to happen.
